body: Hi i would like to apply for staff not right away but sometime before the end of the month so i would like a general idea when they will be so i can kind of prepare for them i guess
body_tagged: Hi i would like to apply for staff not right away but sometime before the end of the month so i would like a general idea when they will be so i can kind of prepare for them i guess
title: when are staff applications gonna be up

replies.body:
We don't have staff applications anymore, we kinda choose you if we feel you deserve it. So just be a good guy and try to get noticed, that's all the advice I can give you. 

Have a great day :)
replies.body_tagged:
We don't have staff applications anymore, we kinda choose you if we feel you deserve it. So just be a good guy and try to get noticed, that's all the advice I can give you. 

Have a great day :)

replies.body:
Staff applications are not open at the moment, the staff are using a hand picked system so just be nice and helpful in game and who knows, you might be picked!

EDIT: Ninja'ed by Javi xD
